snippet: Richard Glossip is to die on Wednesday for arranging a murder in 1997.
abstract: Oklahoma Gov Mary Fallin says execution of Richard Glossip will continue as scheduled, despite appeals from Glossip's defense lawyers and others who claim new evidence shows he is not guilty of arranging murder in 1997.
lead_paragraph: Richard Glossip is to die on Wednesday for arranging a murder in 1997.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Governor Refuses Request to Delay Execution
headline.print_headline: Plains; Oklahoma: Governor Refuses Request to Delay Execution in Arranged Murder
